typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	cutoff_time as string ('2000-01-01  00:00:00')
}
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as integer,
		SalespersonPersonID as integer,
		LastEditedWhen as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [OrderID], [CustomerID], [SalespersonPersonID],[LastEditedWhen] FROM [Sales].[Orders]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceSales
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		BillToCustomerID as integer,
		DeliveryCityID as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		PostalPostalCode as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		CustomerCategoryID as integer,
		BuyingGroupID as integer,
		PrimaryContactPersonID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [CustomerID], [BillToCustomerID], \n[DeliveryCityID], \n[ValidFrom], [ValidTo], [PostalPostalCode], [CustomerName], [CustomerCategoryID], [BuyingGroupID], [PrimaryContactPersonID] FROM [Sales].[Customers]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCustomers
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2),
		TaxRate as decimal(18,3),
		TaxAmount as decimal(18,2),
		LineProfit as decimal(18,2),
		Description as string,
		StockItemID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [InvoiceID], [PackageTypeID], [Quantity], [UnitPrice], [TaxRate], [TaxAmount], [LineProfit], [Description], [StockItemID] FROM [Sales].[InvoiceLines]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceInvoiceLines
source(output(
		InvoiceID as integer,
		TotalDryItems as integer,
		TotalChillerItems as integer,
		OrderID as integer,
		InvoiceDate as date,
		ConfirmedDeliveryTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [InvoiceID], [TotalDryItems], [TotalChillerItems], [OrderID],  [InvoiceDate], [ConfirmedDeliveryTime] FROM [Sales].[Invoices]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceInvoices
source(output(
		PackageTypeID as integer,
		PackageTypeName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [PackageTypeID],[PackageTypeName] FROM [Warehouse].[PackageTypes]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcePackageTypes
source(output(
		CustomerCategoryID as integer,
		CustomerCategoryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [CustomerCategoryID], [CustomerCategoryName] FROM [Sales].[CustomerCategories]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceCustCategory
source(output(
		BuyingGroupID as integer,
		BuyingGroupName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [BuyingGroupID], [BuyingGroupName] FROM [Sales].[BuyingGroups]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceBuyingGroups
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [PersonID], [FullName] FROM [Application].[People]',
	format: 'query') ~> sourcePeople
sourceSales filter(LastEditedWhen >= toTimestamp($cutoff_time)) ~> Filter
Filter, sourceCustomers join(sourceSales@CustomerID == sourceCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCust
JoinCust, sourceInvoices join(sourceSales@OrderID == sourceInvoices@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInvoices
JoinInvoices, sourceInvoiceLines join(sourceInvoices@InvoiceID == sourceInvoiceLines@InvoiceID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinInvoiceLines
JoinPackage derive({Total Excluding Tax} = Quantity * UnitPrice,
		{Tax Amount} = Quantity * UnitPrice * TaxRate/100,
		{Total Including Tax} = Quantity * UnitPrice * (1 + TaxRate/100),
		{Delivery Date Key} = toDate(ConfirmedDeliveryTime),
		{Lineage Key} = toTimestamp($cutoff_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),
		sale = 'Sale') ~> DerivedColumn
JoinInvoiceLines, sourcePackageTypes join(sourceInvoiceLines@PackageTypeID == sourcePackageTypes@PackageTypeID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPackage
sourceCustomers, sourceCustCategory join(sourceCustomers@CustomerCategoryID == sourceCustCategory@CustomerCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCategory
JoinCategory, sourceBuyingGroups join(sourceCustomers@BuyingGroupID == sourceBuyingGroups@BuyingGroupID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBuyingGroup
JoinBuyingGroup, sourcePeople join(PrimaryContactPersonID == PersonID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinPrimaryContact
JoinPrimaryContact, sourceCustomers join(sourceCustomers@BillToCustomerID == sourceCustomers@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinBillToCust
DerivedColumn sink(input(
		{Sale Staging Key} as long,
		{City Key} as integer,
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{Bill To Customer Key} as integer,
		{Stock Item Key} as integer,
		{Invoice Date Key} as date,
		{Delivery Date Key} as date,
		{Salesperson Key} as integer,
		{WWI Invoice ID} as integer,
		Description as string,
		Package as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Total Excluding Tax} as decimal(18,2),
		{Tax Amount} as decimal(18,2),
		Profit as decimal(18,2),
		{Total Including Tax} as decimal(18,2),
		{Total Dry Items} as integer,
		{Total Chiller Items} as integer,
		{WWI City ID} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		{WWI Bill To Customer ID} as integer,
		{WWI Stock Item ID} as integer,
		{WWI Salesperson ID} as integer,
		{Last Modified When} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{City Key} = DeliveryCityID,
		{Customer Key} = sourceSales@CustomerID,
		{Bill To Customer Key} = BillToCustomerID,
		{Stock Item Key} = StockItemID,
		{Invoice Date Key} = InvoiceDate,
		{Delivery Date Key},
		{Salesperson Key} = SalespersonPersonID,
		{WWI Invoice ID} = sourceInvoices@InvoiceID,
		Description,
		Package = PackageTypeName,
		Quantity,
		{Unit Price} = UnitPrice,
		{Tax Rate} = TaxRate,
		{Total Excluding Tax},
		{Tax Amount} = TaxAmount,
		Profit = LineProfit,
		{Total Including Tax},
		{Total Dry Items} = TotalDryItems,
		{Total Chiller Items} = TotalChillerItems,
		{WWI City ID} = DeliveryCityID,
		{WWI Customer ID} = sourceSales@CustomerID,
		{WWI Bill To Customer ID} = BillToCustomerID,
		{WWI Stock Item ID} = StockItemID,
		{WWI Salesperson ID} = SalespersonPersonID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink
DerivedColumn sink(input(
		{Table Name} as string,
		{Cutoff Time} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{Table Name} = sale,
		{Cutoff Time} = {Lineage Key}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkETLcutoff
JoinBillToCust sink(input(
		{Customer Staging Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{WWI Customer ID} = CustomerID,
		Customer = sourceCustomers@CustomerName,
		{Bill To Customer} = sourceCustomers@CustomerName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkCust
